thought: To craft light_gray_terracotta, I need to craft light_gray_dye, which can be crafted from an oxeye_daisy. Therefore, I will move the oxeye_daisy from slot 37 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 37 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
